home.access: By opening an account in RICAR comprehensive accounting system, from anywhere and using any device You can easily log in to your account dashboard from and Access all data
home.title1: Record servers always reduce the possibility of document loss to zero by constantly backing up and updating.
home.title2: The body's cloud system needs to have an advanced system always at a high speed
home.aboutRekar2: From the Ricard parts, we can mention the accounting system of the store warehouse, etc., which does not need to install software in the web-based system of the user's body, and enters its dashboard at any place and any time using any device. You can access your data
home.aboutRekar3: Rikar is a web-based accounting system in which all company data is installed on Rikar servers and, if necessary, locally on the client system. Rekar tries to cover all parts of the accounting system with the simplest visual solutions and make accounting easier by relying on the knowledge of its software team.
